short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turbocharge your job search. AI-powered automation for smarter applications. Elevate your career now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗚𝗲𝘁 8x more 𝗶𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄𝘀! Beat employers' job robots (ATS) with our help. We match your resume to job postings and fill out applications for you. Apply for hundreds of jobs in minutes on LinkedIn, Indeed and 50+ other job boards.

🎯 New Feature: 𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗔𝗜 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝘂𝗺𝗲 𝗖𝗵𝗲𝗰𝗸𝗲𝗿 & 𝗦𝗰𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿! 
Get instant feedback on your resume and scan it for errors here: https://jobautopilot.com/cv-analysis

Core Features:
✅ 𝗝𝗼𝗯 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗸𝗲𝗿: Automatically organizes your applications, tasks, and notes into one dashboard.
✅ 𝗝𝗼𝗯 𝗟𝗶𝘀𝘁: We have collected jobs from direct employer websites.
✅ 𝗛𝗲𝗹𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘀: Get human expert advice on resumes, interviews, and more.
✅ 𝗔𝗜 𝗧𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀: Access the best free AI tools for fast job search.

How it Works:
1️⃣ Install the extension and login to your JobAutopilot account.
2️⃣ It fills out job application forms and adjusts your resume to match job keywords.
3️⃣ Our extension learns from your online job search and helps you apply to matching jobs.

🌟 Follow us on LinkedIn for industry insights and news: https://www.linkedin.com/company/JobAutopilot-com/

🆘 Need Help or Have Questions?
For any assistance, please reach out to our support team at support@jobautopilot.com

🔒 Your Privacy Matters:
We protect your data and only use it to improve your job search journey. We don't sell your data to anyone. Learn more about our privacy promise:  https://jobautopilot.com/privacy

🚀 Turbocharge your job search with JobAutopilot.com 
🌟 Get started today and land your dream job!
